transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Jeff. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I want to dispute a charge on my statement.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can help you with that. Could you please confirm your account number?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you. I see your account now. How can I assist you today?
